item.title: Sonic Wings Reunion coming west on October 7
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/05/sonic-wings-reunion-coming-west-on-october-7

  • Arcade
  • PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch

Published by Red Art Games.

Red Art Games will release SUCCESS Corporation-developed shoot ’em up game for PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, and Switch on October 7 in the west, the publisher announced.

In Europe, Sonic Wings Reunion will be available in multiple physical editions. Full details on each physical editions’ content will be announced when pre-orders launch on May 27 at 8:00 a.m. PT / 11:00 a.m. ET.

In Japan, Sonic Wings Reunion will launch for PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Switch, PC via Steam, and arcades on May 29. Despite the western release not coming until October, it will support English, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, French, German, Spanish, and Portuguese language options. The PC release will likely also be available worldwide.

Here is an overview of the game, via Red Art Games:

About

In the year 20XX, cities all over the world are under attack. The mysterious organization “Fata Morgana” has returned, possessing superweapons and using unknown technology to seize control of the world’s military weapons.

The knights of the sky, the international secret rescue team “Project Blue”, rise up to fight this threat to the world. What awaits them as they take on these new and powerful enemies…?

Latest episode in the longrunning Sonic Wings franchise (known as Aero Fighters in the west), Sonic Wings Reunion is the result of the collaboration between SUCCESS, HAMSTER Corporation, and members of past Sonic Wings games’ development teams. Produced by Shinya Nagatomo (Cotton Rock’n’Roll), Sonic Wings Reunion features character designs by Fumihiko Nantoka (Sonic Wings series) and sound design by Soshi Hosoi (Sonic Wings series).

Key Features

  • More than eight playable characters with their own aircraft and capabilities.
  • Eight stages that take players all around the world.
  • Local cooperative mode.
  • Multiple difficulty levels.
  • Fully customizable Training Mode.
  • Tate Mode.
  • Fully customizable soundtrack featuring new music and songs from past Sonic Wings games.
  • Title screen can be switched from Sonic Wings Reunion to Aero Fighters Reunion.
  • Languages supported: English, Japanese, French, German, Spanish, Portuguese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese.

item.title: Toaplan Arcade Collection Vol. 1 and Vol. 2 coming west on August 14
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/05/toaplan-arcade-collection-vol-1-and-vol-2-coming-west-on-august-14

  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox One
  • Xbox Series

Two weeks ahead of its Japanese release.

Clear River Games will release the newly announced Toaplan Arcade Collection Vol. 1 and Toaplan Arcade Collection Vol. 2 for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and Switch on August 14 in the west, the companies announced. Physical editions will also be available for PlayStation 5.

In Japan, the two collections are not due out until August 28, but physical editions will be available for both PlayStation 5 and Switch.

Here is an overview of the collections, via Clear River Games:

Toaplan is a legendary developer known for its arcade games released throughout the 1980s and 1990s, and the team at Tokyo’s Tatsujin have been tirelessly working to make sure that retro game fans and new gamers alike can continue to enjoy their iconic legacy. Some of the games include not only the Japanese version, but also the international version with different specifications, allowing players to get their hands upon rare titles that were hard to procure in Japan. Swedish modern retro game veterans Bitwave Games, who specialize in blending old-school game design with all luxuries you expect from modern games, have been integral in ensuring that the games’ retro roots sparkle brightly with 21st century mojo.

So what’s on offer in each collection?

Toaplan Arcade Collection Vol. 1 brings you:

  • Flying Shark
  • Fire Shark (local cooperative support)
  • Tiger Heli
  • Twin Cobra (local cooperative support)
  • Out Zone (local cooperative support)
  • Fixeight (local cooperative support)
  • Batsugun (local cooperative support)
  • Dogyuun (local cooperative support)
  • ❮
  • ❯

Toaplan Arcade Collection Vol. 2 contains the following titles:

  • Zero Wing (local cooperative support)
  • Hellfire (local cooperative support)
  • Slap Fight
  • Grind Stormer
  • Truxton
  • Truxton II (local cooperative support)
  • Vimana (local cooperative support)
  • Twin Hawk (local cooperative support)
  • ❮
  • ❯

In order to bring these retro titles into the 2020s, a number of useful quality of life updates have been made to the games to alleviate some of the frustrations that original gamers had to endure from last century gaming, offering a full suite of options for beginners and veterans alike.

  • Trophies and Achievements – PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series, and Xbox One versions feature trophies and achievements.
  • Online Leaderboards – Test your metal against the best in the shoot ’em up community.
  • Stat Tracking – Allows title-specific tracking of stats from your game sessions.
  • Dip Switches – To recreate customizable arcade settings, such as region, lives, difficulty, and autofire.
  • Assist Features – Even more aid features such as smaller hitboxes and increased player durability to let you take additional hits before dying and slowdown / speed-up—a must for anyone who finds old-school SHMUPs a bit too challenging.
  • Settings – Customizable audio settings and screen settings to capture the feeling of the good old days.
  • Rewind Function – So you can go back and correct that little mistake that ruined your run.
  • Quick Save / Load – Allowing you to create up to six save slots per title.

For players wishing for a physical copy of the game, there are a number of first-print bonuses up for grabs:

  • Toaplan Arcade Collection Vol. 1 – Includes an exclusive sleeve made to house both Vol. 1 and Vol. 2.
  • Toaplan Arcade Collection Vol. 2 – Includes an “Instruction Card Gallery Book” containing arcade-style instruction cards for each game, including those in Vol. 1.

item.title: Persona 5: The Phantom X launches June 26 in the west, Japan
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/05/persona-5-the-phantom-x-launches-june-26-in-the-west-japan

  • PC
  • Smartphone

Pre-registration now available.

Free-to-play RPG Persona 5: The Phantom X will launch for PC via Steam, iOS via App Store, and Android via Google Play on June 26 in the west and Japan, publisher ATLUS and developer Black Wings Game Studio announced. It will support Japanese voice-overs with both English and Japanese text.

Persona 5: The Phantom X first launched on April 12, 2024 in China, followed by April 18, 2024 in Taiwan and South Korea.

Here is an overview of the game, via ATLUS:

About

“We’re the Phantom Thieves, and we’re here to steal your heart!”

The beloved RPG series with over 22 million copies sold finally arrives on PC and mobile!

Launch into a captivating RPG experience that takes you beyond the world of Persona 5, with new characters, story, and gameplay!

Dive deeper into the shadows of the Metaverse… and unmask the story of Persona 5: The Phantom X! The latest anime style JRPG in the Persona franchise by ATLUS!

Story

After awakening from a nightmare, the protagonist is thrust into a changed world drained of hope… And the new faces he encounters are no less strange: an eloquent owl named Lefaye, a long-nosed man and a beauty donned in blue. As he navigates the mysterious realms of the Metaverse and the Velvet Room, and grapples with ruinous visions that threaten his everyday life, he must discover what there is to take from this new world—and all in true Phantom Thief style.

  • ❮
  • ❯

Key Features

  • Set in Modern-Day Tokyo – Normal high-school student by day, villain-fighting Phantom Thief by night!
  • Explore the Dungeons of the Heart and Defeat the Distorted Enemy Shadows – Dive into dungeons of the heart called Palaces with your fellow Phantom Thieves, who have awakened their Persona, the power of the heart. Steal the Treasure to restore the warped heart!
  • Stylish, Snappy, and Satisfying Turn-based Combat – Experience the signature flair of the Persona series with striking visuals and addictive moves that can wipe out all your foes in one swoop!
  • Level Up Your Persona, the Power of Your Heart, and Become the Most Powerful Persona-user – Obtain new Personas, infiltrate dungeons of the heart, and prevent a future of ruin!
  • Enjoy Your Youth as a Student – Savor student life in an urban metropolis as a high-school student! How you spend your days after school is up to you—deepen your friendships, devote your time to clubs, or even work part-time!
  • Interact With a Variety of Fascinating Characters – Tons of new characters inhabit the game, created under the supervision of Shigenori Soejima and the rest of the Persona team!

item.title: Wilmot Works It Out coming to Switch on May 22
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/05/wilmot-works-it-out-coming-to-switch-on-may-22

Currently available for PC and Mac.

Publisher Finji and developers Hollow Ponds and Richard Hogg will release a Switch version of Wilmot’s Warehouse sequel Wilmot Works It Out on May 22, the companies announced.

Wilmot Works It Out first launched for PC and Mac via Steam on October 23, 2024.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Wilmot Works It Out is a puzzle building game about completing beautiful images and hanging them in your house.

You play as Wilmot, who likes to unwind from sorting out a warehouse by sorting out puzzle pieces. Yesterday’s puzzle was a snake wearing a hat, but today’s looks like it might be an octopus?… or maybe that’s a hamburger?

Once complete, you decide where to hang it. Then the mail person delivers a brand new puzzle! Oh dear, this one has a few extra pieces – I hope there wasn’t a mix-up at the puzzle delivery service!

Complete a series of puzzles to unlock new customisation options for your house, including colours, wallpapers, bookcases, and cats. This house is going to feel like a home in no time at all!

Key Features

  • Assemble more than 60 original puzzles by Richard Hogg (Hohokum, Flock).
  • Unlock new rooms and customisation items to decorate with!
  • A gentle and slightly jazzy electronic soundtrack to listen to as you ponder and solve, brought to you by composer and sound artist Eli Rainsberry (Wilmot’s Warehouse, Flock).
  • Sequel to beloved organization game Wilmot’s Warehouse.

item.title: Locomoto for Switch launches June 26
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/05/locomoto-for-switch-launches-june-26

  • Switch

Currently available for PC.

The Switch version of train adventure game Locomoto will launch on June 26 for $29.99 / €29.99, publishers THQ Nordic and Amplifier Studios and developer Green Tile Digital announced.

Locomoto first launched for PC via Steam on April 8.

Here is an overview of the game, via Amplifier Studios:

About

Created by indie developers Green Tile Digital, Locomoto reimagines the traditional steam train journey as a captivating creative adventure; blending cozy gameplay with charming humor and heart. As the conductor of their very own locomotive, players can explore a lush immersive world, collect resources, craft furniture, and tend to the needs of their spirited passengers—each brimming with entertaining quirks and their own engaging stories.

Whether decorating with paints, wallpaper, and furniture, expanding the train with new wagons, or completing the townsfolk’s requests, every journey offers a unique and relaxing experience set to an original lofi soundtrack.

Key Features

  • All Aboard for Adventure – Don your conductor’s hat and set a course through the whimsically playful world of Locomoto as you discover new stories, deliver packages, and ferry an array of unique furry passengers between stations.
  • Personalize your Journey – Gather resources to craft a variety of cute, cool and cozy furniture to customize your onboard experience. With an exciting array of unlockable outfits and crafting blueprints to be discovered, get creative as you personalize both your steam train and conductor’s look to suit your own unique style.
  • Befriend the Community – Complete requests and tend to the needs of Locomoto‘s quirky residents as you reconnect towns and forge new connections, earning rewards on your journey to discover the passenger’s unique stories and humorous personalities.
  • Relax with Lofi Beats – Enjoy an original lofi soundtrack as you immerse yourself in a cozy world that allows players to progress at their own pace.

Watch a new trailer below.
